entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , The Pas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: The Pas Airport 12:45 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this afternoon then changing to snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
